_description: Discourse markers for syntactic repair generation and cognitive state simulation

phase_descriptions.Peak: cognitive resources at maximum capacity, highest syntactic complexity tolerance
phase_descriptions.Maintenance: sustained attention with periodic micro-lapses, stable performance
phase_descriptions.Fatigue: noticeably degraded executive function, increased reliance on formulaic constructions
phase_descriptions.Deep Fatigue: severe resource depletion, strong preference for familiar phrasings, minimal working memory

discipline_conventions.default: standard academic conventions with field-appropriate hedging
discipline_conventions.STEM: precise technical terminology, passive voice preference, minimal hedging
discipline_conventions.humanities: complex argumentation, active engagement with sources, nuanced qualifications
discipline_conventions.social_sciences: methodological transparency, balanced hedging, empirical grounding
discipline_conventions.business: action-oriented language, clear implications, stakeholder awareness
discipline_conventions.law: precise definitional language, careful qualification, precedent awareness
discipline_conventions.medicine: clinical precision, evidence-based framing, cautious conclusions
discipline_conventions.engineering: technical specification, quantitative precision, practical orientation

cognitive_load_effects.low: full access to sophisticated vocabulary and complex syntactic structures
cognitive_load_effects.moderate: occasional simplification of nested clauses, slight increase in common collocations
cognitive_load_effects.high: marked preference for familiar constructions, reduced subordinate clause depth
cognitive_load_effects.severe: heavily formulaic output, minimal syntactic variation, increased repetition

fatigue_instructions.Peak: Full cognitive engagement. Complex argumentation expected.
fatigue_instructions.Maintenance: Stable but not peak. Occasional simplification is natural.
fatigue_instructions.Fatigue: Noticeable resource depletion. Prefer familiar constructions.
fatigue_instructions.Deep Fatigue: Severe depletion. Rely heavily on disciplinary boilerplate.

low.instruction: Low latency: maintain full syntactic complexity, minimal ambiguity

moderate.instruction: Moderate latency: occasional pronoun distance effects acceptable

elevated.instruction: Elevated latency: simplify embedded clauses, prefer active voice

high.instruction: High latency: short sentences, simple structures, common vocabulary
High burst speed: may produce 1 function-word typo per 250 words, occasional missed article

moderate.instruction: Moderate burst: stable typing, normal error rate

low.instruction: Low burst: deliberate typing, high accuracy expected

high.description: full nested subordination, technical nominalization, complex hedging

moderate.description: moderate clause depth, standard academic vocabulary, balanced hedging

low.description: simple structures, familiar collocations, minimal subordination
